name: Triage (jeyao14)
description:
A military medical strategy game in which you must save the lives of wounded soldiers.

Created for UCSC's 170 series as my senior capstone project.

Credits: Nick Gleason, James Nguyen, Kody Fong, Stewart Axup, Wendell Ip, Jeffrey Yao, Zhao "Alan" Li, Atirath Kosireddy, Corinne Yee, Fion Kwok, Gillian Yu
